summary: Replaces the Gourmet\\\'s room in the Nightgate Inn Cellar with a custom kitchen with some custom materials.
descriptionHtml:
The Gourmet Lives!  The cellar has been cleared of all the barrels and the like for future modification.  The Gourmet\\\'s bedroom is now his Kitchen.  The Gourmet is now dressed in the cooks outfit and can be an undying follower.  If you haven\\\'t finished the dark brotherhood quest in which you kill the previous gourmet, simply disable to mod on on the startup screen and enable after you have completed it.

 This is the first mod I\\\'ve uploaded

To install simply navigate to C drive then Program files (or program filesx86) then steam then steamapps  then skyrim then data and drag the file there.
author: KevBoy
